This course is not very advanced. I like how Nando intuitively explains some concepts. And I also like the pointers to Murphy (2012)

Great course. My main support for the “Compression” project that I’m starting soon

I like it because it is clearly following Bishop (2006). I can easily jump back and forth between the two when needed.
